quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"dissociative"（分离的）的词根误解，或混淆"精神分裂症"等类似心理学术语而误判
quiz_item.sentence: The patient, who had experienced severe childhood trauma, was diagnosed with **dissociative identity disorder** after displaying multiple distinct personalities that were unaware of each other.

option.definition: 分离性身份障碍（多重人格障碍）
身份认同障碍（Identity Crisis Disorder）
人格失调障碍（Personality Dysregulation Disorder）
